content: पुत्रः {@--1@} A son; (the word is thus derived: --पुन्नाम्नो नरकाद्यस्मात्त्रायते पितरं सुतः . तस्मात्पुत्र इति प्रोक्तः स्वयमेव स्वयंभुवा .. <ls>Ms. 9. 138</ls>; the word, therefore, should be strictly written पुत्त्रः) {@--2@} A child, the young one of an animal. {@--3@} A dear child (a term of endearment in addressing young persons). {@--4@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Anything little or small of its kind; as in असिपुत्रः, शिलापुत्रः &c. --त्रौ (<ab>du.</ab>) A son and daughter.
